name: Courtney Holloway
text: Bass Homes is a joke. Have you ever felt scammed? If you enjoyed that feeling then I would go see Bass Homes. These people are crooks, each and every one of them. We planned to build with them starting next year. We put a $3,000 deposit down. We sold our home and moved into a camper. We had to back out of our plans because of issues with financing our land. Jim told us REPEATEDLY that we would receive our down payment back. We continued to call and message and we were ignored. Here we are, two months later, a week before Christmas, and Bill Bass decides to refund $2,000 and keep a grand for himself. He says that they already paid an architect to draw up plans, but he knows and I know that this is a lie. Merry Christmas to you and your family Bill Bass. DO NOT TRUST THIS COMPANY.

John was always available to answer our questions, listen to our concerns and go the extra mile to ensure he delivered on his commitments as well as the success of the project.  If you are looking for someone who is fair, competent, and focused on ensuring a quality home we highly recommend John Griggs!  Jamie and Mary Christian

name: Darlene Lugo
text: I spent several months interviewing contractors and cabinet makers to renovate my kitchen. Blue Falls was the first company that I invited I into my home to discuss my vision and request a quote for their services. I was extremely impressed with Blue Falls professionalism and their ability to provide a detailed plan on how they would go about achieving my desired results. After months of gathering quotes, I chose Brandon and Shelly Cantron at Blue Falls as my contractor. They were neither the cheapest or the most expensive, but fell in line with my budget. Their work is thorough and Brandon's wood working skills are impeccable. Many of the custom details I requested involved tedious and exhausting labor. Blue Falls have proved themselves to be capable of the tasks and accomplished in their desire to put the customer first. Throughout this process, my confidence that there are still good people in the world has been restored. After working with them, I consider them to be more than a business acquaintance and have elevated them to the status of friends. They are honest, caring and reliable business owners and are all around good people. I highly recommend Blue Falls of Huntsville to anyone that is looking to update their home or work place and wants the job done right.

text: We built in an attic space to create an office. It was a pretty involved job. AC, Sheetrock, paint, framing, window cut through brick, etc. Blue Falls did an amazing job. Anyone who goes in the room can’t believe it used to be an attic. Brandon is great to work with. Highly recommend!

name: Scarlett Vinson
text: My husband and I have been renting with Tom West since March of 2016. From the beginning, the women that work there were very short and snooty with us, especially a young girl that worked at the front at the desk with short brown hair. Her nose was so far in the air, I don't even know if she knew what earth looked like. I got the vibe of "I'm better than you". No one is better than anyone no matter how much money you make, or what you wear, or what you do for a living. We haven't really had that many issues except a few. First of all, we own a dog. A well trained amazing dog. When we saw the house at first, the carpet was terrible. There was a huge black stain on the carpet in the living room and it was coming up at the seams in some places. You could tell the carpet was cheap and old and quite frankly plain nasty. They (owners/tom west) refused to replace the carpet because we had a dog. Also, the kitchen tile was terrible and in some places of the house, you could tell needed to be replaced. Second, We called Tom West a couple months back about a bed bug infestation. When we moved in, we had noticed little bugs a few places, but in the lease agreement, it stated we were to take care of pest control, not realizing they were bed bugs. We did not have bed bugs at our apartment and had verification from the previous landlord. We never called until about a year later when we couldn't get rid of them and they refused to pay to get them removed after we had tried just about everything. Its laughable now because we are moving out and they are still going to have to pay to remove them. Also, in the moving out procedures, you have to pay to get the carpet cleaned. They want me to have that cheap, stained carpet to get professionally clean knowing they are probably going to remove it anyways. We brought our newborn into this home thinking this could be our home for a bit, and now we are moving out 7 months later because it's just what's best. Over all, I would say the company is ok, but pick them last if you have to. When I rent again, they will be last on my list of companies to go through just mainly because of customer service and not taking care of their customers the way it should be and maybe it has a lot to do with the owners of the property as well in which case they need to be realistic as well.

name: Donna Harbert
text: I've never been so upset at one company in my entire life. I rented a home that was left in wonderful condition! 1 small repair and 1 blind was all that I had trouble taking care of before I left. I asked the front clerk the day I was turning my keys in if I could purchase a new pair of blinds and drop them off or even borrow the key to replace them myself because I wanted to do the right thing... she so RUDELY told me she would have to charge me another day. As a customer coming to you and WANTING to do the right thing, I was beyond upset to know this was so rudely handled. My security deposit that was mailed to me is literally NOT EVEN a quarter of what I paid up front because of the "repairs & blinds installment" I was charged for. I will never ever again deal with this scam company who rips people off and so rudely present themselves to their customers. I also will never recommend them. If you pay a security deposit with them and leave them with a decent home as when you moved in, don't expect your deposit back. They will find "repairs" to get you with. Completely & utterly disgusted with this company. Worst in Dothan.

name: Cornelius Clark
text: Tom West is probably one of, if not,  the biggest company in the Dothan area when it comes to renting or buying homes in the area. For starters the customer service in the main office is by far the WORST I have ever dealt with. Everyone is short and snobby especially the females that work at the front desk. I was renting one of their properties for close to 5 years. I travel a lot with my job and that was the only reason I stayed there so long. When I moved in I immediately had issues with things that were suppose to be done but wasn't. Had issues with things breaking and not working properly. It took forever to get some one out to take care of the issues. Then I move out and I have to get the carpets cleaned and provide a receipt only to be told that the carpets weren't good enough and they would have to have the company they use to come out and clean it again and charge it to me. They will not do a walkthrough inspection with the tenant before moving out. Then as I expected, my $575 security deposit is taken for painting the townhouse, so called repairs and cleaning. I paid to have the place cleaned as well but they have no plans on returning your security deposit. They make up whatever they can with no explanation. Just a horrible company to work with and I would NEVER recommend to anyone..Avoid at all cost. I notice all the 1 star reviews with the one 5 star review...that had to be a mistake!!! If I could give 0 stars I would!!!!!

name: Brooke Kelley
text: Horrible customer service. They do not take care of their properties or rental customers. We were told upon moving in to do a walk through and make a list of things that were wrong. We did, and we took pictures and gave them a list of about 15 issues we noticed. We rented a property from them for a year and in that year they fixed one thing off our list. Upon moving out we followed all procedures listed in our rental agreement. Most of the things on our list upon moving in we were charged for when moving out!!!! On top of that they made things up along the way in order to keep our initial deposit of $1150.00. They said that the property had leaks, mold and that we didn’t turn in the keys and garage door opener all of which was untrue. We did not receive ANY of our deposit back plus they tried to tell us we owed an additional $500 +! When we called to tell them to take it out of the deposit they kept they informed us that it was over and beyond that. Then they changed their story to say that when we didn’t turn in our keys(which we did) that we forfeited our security deposit?! When we asked what the additional money was for we also got a different story every time we called....first it was for removal of items(we left hangers 🙄) then it was for carpet cleaning....call me crazy but last time I checked neither of these cost 1600 dollars! They then sent us invoices that they had that they said we were being charged for cleaning fees???! Entire house was cleaned and left in better shape than when we moved in. Funny thing being, the three invoices they sent for the work done which was all minor cleaning around the house didn’t even total 500.....do not rent from these lying thieves that cannot keep their stories straight!!!!

name: William Walski
text: Excellent experience with Lisenby Construction.  Great work at a reasonable price.  Kept us informed throughout the entire process of remodeling a bathroom and painting 3 additional rooms.  Would definitely recommend this company.

resp.text: Thank you sir! We hope to be of service in the future.

name: Rick Harris
text:
Lisenby Construction just finished a three-week remodel of our kitchen and living room, and we could not be more pleased.  The project involved demo of some existing kitchen cabinets, replacement of a cook top and stove with a range, replacement of a vent hood, installing new kitchen lighting, laying tile, painting cabinets and bookshelves, painting trim, and painting walls.  All of this was handled by David's crew without having to sub out any work. The quality of the work done was really top-tier.  We used David's decorating consultant, Lindy, to help pick out colors, and the result has significantly brightened and beautified the two rooms where we spend most of our waking hours.

When you undertake a project that takes this much time, you quickly realize that you have invited some strangers into your home for a lengthy stay.   Well, the guys David sent did not stay strangers for very long.  They were cheerful, friendly, and helpful to us.  They added, without cost, some features to the project at our request, even though these features were not in the original contract-- for example, installing a dimmer switch in the kitchen, replacing flood lights in our dinette area so they would match the color put out by our new kitchen lighting, cutting out the trim along one wall of our living room so our bookcase could lay flat against the wall, and installing wall outlets in our bookcase.  They cleaned up after themselves every day and hauled away their own trash.  When they moved furniture around to do some painting, they always put it back where it had been.  It got to where we enjoyed having the company at our house.  At the end of the job, we were glad it was completed, but we were sorry to see the guys leave.

All the work was done with great attention to detail.  They found and installed tile to match our existing kitchen backsplash tile.  They worked on our project every weekday for three weeks.  On some days, they worked on our cabinet doors and bookcase at their shop, but on the days when they did not come, David always called us to let us know they would not be there and what they would be doing that day.

We will certainly call on Lisenby Construction if we undertake new remodeling projects.  Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you Rick for your kind words and for trusting us with your home remodeling needs!

name: Susan Schneider
text: The end product exceeded our expectations. The quality of the craftsmanship was excellent. The Lisenby team was courteous, professional and provided excellent quality work. I would recommend them to anyone anticipating a home upgrading.

resp.text: Thank you Susan! We enjoyed working with you guys! Your new Kitchen is beautiful!

name: Caitlin Singletary
text: This was our first remodel, and it could not have gone smoother! The team was easy to talk to, and they were easy to reach when we had questions. They kept us up-to-date on expectations and the timing of everything. The remodel took 4 days (from demo to completion). The team arrived early each day, and they even worked holidays. They cleaned up daily (vacuumed and cleaned stainless steel appliances). We were also impressed when working with a company they contracted with. While the other company was doing their part, the Lisenby team was present, and they made sure the job was done right/well. In fact, at one point, the Lisenby team told the other team to fix something before leaving. Overall, we were highly impressed, and we intend to work with Lisenby again in the near future when we do additional remodeling!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us work on your kitchen Caitlin, we will look forward to working with you again! And thank you referring to us as a team, we work hard on developing a team culture here.

name: Julie Freeman
text: We have used Lisenby construction on numerous projects over the years. Each has been designed and completed with care and pride. We love our home and the renovation they provided. In fact, we are planning to work with David and his crew again on another project we hope will begin soon. It is so nice to have someone so dependable, competent, and professional.

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to be of service over the years. We look forward to your next project! Having repeat customers like you, has been the key to our success!

name: Mitch Robinson
text: We are very pleased with Lisenby Construction. They were very knowledgeable, detail oriented, and responsive to feedback. Our kitchen, and master bath was transformed into pure beauty. All we can say is thank you very much!!

name: Janie Marsh
text: I was very impressed with the quality of the work Lisenby Construction did. Our porch extension matches perfectly with the original structure. The workers were all very nice and they constantly maintained a clean work area. We are extremely pleased with how our project turned out.

name: Brett Kenny
text: Lisenby Construction build our house, they did such a good job completely exceeding our expectations. We would recommend them to anyone looking for a home improvement or a new home. They are great!

name: Clayton Clark
text: I recently got my kitchen done by Lisenby construction and was very satisfied with the work they did. I found them online by chance and was pleased that they did a good job. Thumbs up!

name: Denise Ortiz
text: I really appreciate the way the team helped us set up subcontractors such as hvac, electric, and plumbing. We also had to change the design of our house and they were able to provide us with different options to be able to address the issue. It was nice to have choices.

name: Gwen Allen-Smith
text: Really good people and high quality work.

resp.text: It was such a pleasure to work with you on your kitchen remodeling project! It was a joy and pleasure being around your positive and high energy personality!

name: Luke Mayben
text: Mr. Lisenby did what he said he was going to do... at the price he quoted...in the time frame he said it would take. He was one of the most professional people I found while trying to get our kitchen remodeled.

name: Jessyca Henderson
text: I cannot say enough good things about Lisenby. I would rate them 10/10 for every category that there is. They have have completed three different projects for me!

name: Mike J
text: They did such a great job in all areas that they helped us in our house. Everything was completed in a timely manner and we loved the end results.

name: Harry Vaughn
text: Working with Lisenby Construction was great. They did an excellent job. The employees that completed the project were efficient and friendly.

name: Chelsea Harris
text: Lisenby Construction built our house. They worked with us one on one to discuss the design of the house and how many bedrooms we were going to add. Originally we wanted only 2 but they talked us into 3 for resale value.

name: Glenn Cole
text: Lisenby Constructoin worked diligently to get the project done. We were very impressed by the finishing look and we would definitely hire them again.

name: Keith Raby
text: We found Lisenby Construction from searching around online. We were so pleased with the work they did and would use them again if we decide to do another project.

name: Parker Bryars

name: McMullen HOA

name: David Brownstein
text: Lisenby did work for us on our kitchen, it was more than we could have asked for. It included everything we wanted and we were beyond happy with the result.

name: Rudy Sparks

name: Seth Hansen
text: Lisenby Construction always does a great job for us. They always exceed our expectations.

name: Byron Machen
text: I was very impressed with the quality of the work.  Our porch extension matches perfectly with the original structure.  The workers were all very nice and they constantly maintained a clean work area.  We are extremely pleased with how our project turned out.

name: Al Yates
text: Excellent, professional, and courteous service with attention to detail!

name: james walker
text: My wife and I hired JWW to build a deck on our house. He gave us several options and recommended the one that would be most cost effective . It really looks nice and we'll built.  Definitely recommending JWW

name: Susanl Croft
text: S. S. Steele just finished the build on our Regency home and it turned out beautiful.  S.S. Steele did a wonderful job.  They were very responsive and helpful through the whole building process and the job was completed in a very timely manner.  Would highly recommend this builder.  Again, thank you S. S. Steele for everything.

name: Herewego- again
text: They have great prices. Good Quality workmanship, and the greatest staff.

name: Heidi Hanchey
text: The lady that answered phone was to busy to make appointment for us to talk about a house. They have 40 year old model to show what they do. They have no modern update homes to look at.  They tell you and can not show you. So you have no idea what you are buying.

resp.text:
I'm sorry you feel that way. Between our two locations, we have 4 models for viewing. The oldest model home is 23 years old, which we have updated a couple times since it was built. Our newest model for viewing is 10 years old.

This is the first time I've heard of anyone speaking to a salesperson and not being able to set up an appointment. I will be happy to look into that.

name: kurt porter
text: Excellent conversation about the plans we have. Looking forward to working with this company.

name: John Swear
text: Has a home built 2006 by them and very satisfied with it. Great business

name: Kcrofford

name: Lydia L

name: Sammy Mead
text: Several times our home construction had to be stopped because of the weather, but the workers took every precaution to make sure that the house was not ruined. They cared about our home as if it was their own.

name: Heather Koploe
text: SS Steele built my home, and it is top quality. It has really nice cabinets and I would have to say it's the nicest house I have ever lived in.

name: Brendan M
text: They bent over backwards to make sure all of our changes and modifications made it into the house. There were no problems with adding and customizing the house before the building process.

name: Allison Sheridan
text: SS Steele built my house a while ago. Their customer service is top notch. Any time I would call with a question they were always quick to respond and rectify the issue.

text: My husband and I have had a few houses built throughout the years, and working with S.S. Steele Homes was the best experience we have ever had.

text: I would definitely recommend them!

name: Lacy Ritchie
text: I can't think of anything S S Steele Homes needs to improve!

name: Lisa Grady
text: Stoneridge homes failed to honor prices quoted two weeks prior while actively selecting a floorplan and waiting to see if the plan would fit on the lot requested. Some time in the two week they had a price increase, we understand increases happen, however they should have stuck with the price quoted. We even offer to paid the new price if Stoneridge offer an allowance for the difference, Mrs. Wright refused the offer or anything to compensate for not honoring the original price. Future buyers beware.

name: Paul Elliott
text: Very nice...New up and coming neighborhood in Madison, Al.

name: Kevin Boldin
text: Don't know  whole lot about it

name: Chris Henke
text: Better product, better experience,  better value than woodland.

name: Steve Oldham
text:
Before choosing AHP we decided we needed a builder that would answere our calls and provide answers to our questions throughout the build. We found AHP and specifically Ken Jackson in the beginning to be very responsive and knowledgeable about their options and building process. Other builders we contacted didn’t  answer our calls. After a few months of looking for lots and deciding on a modified plan that fit our budget,we were excited to contract with AHP.
Since we weren’t going to be present  for the build,it was important that we had a good project manager for the build. Fortunately we ended up with Clay Clayson. Clay communicated with us at least once per week to bring us up to speed on the progress of the house.we built several homes before this project so we knew what to expect. This build went the smoothest. The contractors were mostly great with very few do overs. We were able to complete the project with no change orders. We did have a couple problems do to winter weather and material availability due to COVID 19 but thanks to Clay and his boss Jim we worked through it.
My wife and I give AHP 5 stars. And highly recommend them. We are very happy with our home.

name: Anthony Norton
text: Ken Jackson with America's Home Place went above and beyond to help us find the plan that would work for us in our budget.  He helped  with all the little details involved in starting our new home and worked with the bank to get prices where we needed them. We have had a great experience so far in this journey. This company has had great customer service so far. I would highly recommend.

name: Tracy Piltzecker
text: We are at the beginning stages of building with AHP. So far it has been a great experience. Ken, Will and Jim have been great... now we only need Mother Nature to cooperate!

name: Angela Evans
text: My husband and I are doing our first build in Alabama and decided to start our adventure with America's Home Place (AHP). This was truly the best decision we made in this process. While we have been given some challenges (not at the fault of AHP), we feel more comfortable due to our Project Manager, Clay Chason, and the superb service and expertise he is providing with our build. Clay managed the challenges and put us at ease. Clay makes this experience a joyful one, which is how it should be. With him at the lead, we can enjoy the process and not be stressed and nervous. Going with AHP (and having Clay at the helm) is the only way to build your  top-notch home. We cannot thank you enough Clay for being our champion!

name: WILLIE LITTLE
text: Was very good got treat with much respect thanks again

name: Sharon Spears
text:
My experience started out great with Ken and Kara. Being a widow I was nervous about starting this process but they were very patient with me and never made me feel uncomfortable with my decision to build.They worked with me to give me exactly what I wanted in a home. When in the process of clearing the land, the contractor ran into problems and it slowed the process down. Not AHP fault but it seemed to take a long time to get cleared up. A new Project Manager, Chris Barrett was assigned to my project and things really started to take off! He was fabulous! Almost everyday he had something scheduled to be done on the house. There were issues that came up that Chris handled promptly. I have been in my home for 3 weeks and I am very pleased with the finished product.
I recommend America's Home Place in Opelika for anyone wanting a new home.
BTW, my late husband was a inspector for the county and inspected several homes before his passing. He was a very detail oriented person--It had to be right or he would not have it! He was very impressed with the quality of workmanship that went into the AHP homes he inspected.  That gave me the confidence to enlist AHP to build my home.

name: Roger Evans
text:
My wife and I are currently in the process of building a home with America's Home Place in Opelika, AL and have been extremely happy with the professionalism and attention provided by their staff.  Our Project Manager, Clay Chason, has been amazing in his work to coordinate all the details as well as keeping us informed to prevent issues that would have created delays by any other contractor. The staff at AHP Opelika  has been a pleasure to work with and has helped us with the custom home design and selection of materials that will make our new home everything we have hoped for. Thank you AHP Opelika.
Roger Evans

name: Thomas Riggins
text: We used Americas Home Place to build in Dadeville, Al. As we were very particular about many of the items wanted and design, Ken helped a lot and was very patient in getting those plans on paper. We made many modifications, making this quite a challenge, i.e. room dimension changes, enlarged porch, special outlets placements, door placement, gas line placements and house position on the lot in order to have the view we wanted. At times this became perplexing when, initially, there was confusion about initial design and follow through with change orders (plan changes made prior to construction).  As Clay came on midway through our project, he was great in getting all the changes incorporated into the house and reviewing/explaining how other items we wondered about could be better done, and, at the same time save money.  Clay did not just stop in and review, he spent multiple on site visits to accommodate us, our schedule, and many of these meetings involved hours, not minutes. As a result, we got what we wanted and feel good with the follow up provided by Americas Home Place and Clay's on site management.

name: Heath Wade
text: Very unorganized on every aspect of building phases so far.  Building was supposed to start in October but we are in January now and have barely broken ground.  Price on home went up tremendously with every visit in the planning stage.  Details left out constantly that had previously been discussed.  Schedules not met due to lack of control over subcontractors.  So far our experience has been a train wreck!  So far we are regretting our decision of using them to build our dream home!

name: Jennifer Woolward
text: Everyone on the AHP team are great genuine folks.  They've helped us plan our home with a mother-in-law add-on.  Despite many details and complexities to work through, they've made it a smooth process.  Ken, our salesperson, has done great with turning our vision into something real and has been so patient as we've trudged through planning.  The project manager, Sam, is nice and makes everything so easy and has loads of experience.  Stewart, the owner, is a nice down to earth guy... someone I'm glad to support.  They have all been so helpful and have made it possible to build exactly what our family needs/wants.  We will definitely be telling others about our positive experience.

name: Roger Waddell
text:
My house was just completed in October and I am very pleased with it and glad to show it off. Our first meeting with Ken was thorough and we came away with the knowledge to make a decision on purchasing, even though there were a couple of promises not kept.
The first phase of building was not suitable to me. No one would return my calls to keep me informed of the delays on starting the house. Also I was told 90 to a 100 days building time barring a hurricane or other major event.
When Anthony Robinson took over things really started to come together.
He kept me informed of each step and what was happening, that's what
a person needs to know. He turned out to be a friend and hopefully if anyone who reads this you will get Anthony to be your person in charge.
I will recommend Americas Home Place to build homes. They build good homes. Some people can go without being informed of delays and so forth. I needed to know.
Again kudos to Anthony for a job well done.

name: Jan Taunton
text: We started visiting America's Home Place locations in 2019 to see (in person) the Union and the Nottely. We began working with building consultant Ken Jackson at the Opelika office and signed our contract in December 2019, rearranging those house plans to meet our needs to build on Lake Martin. Ken was knowledgeable and helped us tremendously, quick to answer any question we had or make changes we desired. Paula Avery, Sales Assistant was most helpful in our colors selection. On February 27, we signed our Final Design Plans. We had no idea what delays we would meet when the pandemic hit in mid-March but we were assured by Sam Mitchell our Project Manager, "you can expect some minor delays but overall we will still complete your home in a very timely manner." Then a straight-line storm hit and trees were down all around our subdivision which caused a delay until power could be restored and roads could be cleared. Lots of unforeseen delays, delays that were frustrating, but Sam did a great job of clearing the lot and building the foundation during a pandemic. Communication during the foundation process was less than we expected. When the foundation was completed at the end of May, construction was turned over to builder Clay Chason. From that time, we began to "see" the progress, lots of progress. Clay was quick to answered every question and checked in with us almost daily. We quickly learned that his decisions were inline with ours. We feel AHP used quality materials and workers. The subs seemed to arrive promptly. Some of our favorite people working on our house were Noe Reyes and his crews, as well as Matt Pickering and his crew. They were very friendly and respectful of our home and property. Some of our least favorite subs were the sheet rock crew and the electricians, we feel they were disrespectful by littering and tracking/leaving mud everywhere. Clay made sure the messes were cleaned up quickly and all work was completed in a timely manner. Clay Chason made the building experience very easy for us and he kept a close eye on our budget, we actually came in under budget. Would we build with America's Home Place again? Definitely! Especially if Clay Chason was our builder! Thank you America's Home Place for making our dreams come true!

name: Tom Brizzi
text:
Ken, Kara and especially Chris were great to work with during the entire planning and build of our vacation home.  Ken and Kara were very helpful allowing my wife and I to customize any of AHP's standard floor plans and picking out colors, fixtures, flooring, etc. to make this new home the way we wanted it.  We were very pleased with the pricing Ken worked up compared to other quotes and estimates we had from other local custom home builders.

Being an engineer and raised in a family that worked in construction, I had many, MANY questions during the build process and I am sure I was a very challenging customer.  Chris Barrett was a GREAT Project Manager and oversaw the entire build of the home.  Throughout the build, he always was quick to return calls or emails, send pictures and kept me up to date on what was going on; as I was out of state during this build of our vacation home.  AHP broke ground mid September and the completed the build and handed us the keys to our new home by the end of December.  We were VERY impressed with the 3.5 month build time when we heard many horror stories of custom home builders in the area taking over a year to build a home with weeks going by of nothing happening; often struggling to find subcontractors available to complete their parts.  AHP builds enough homes every year that most their "Sub's" do a lot of work for them regularly and will even travel to the job site from quite some distance to keep the higher volume of work AHP offers them.

Considering the price AHP charged, the overall quality of the home they built and the time it took them to complete the home, we are VERY satisfied.  I am sure we could have found a custom builder to build a more expensive home, with more expensive components over a much longer period of time, but for what we wanted for a vacation home, I think AHP was the perfect choice of a home builder for my wife and I.

name: M B
text:
We literally wasted 2 months with incorrect information. The fact that the builder had been out to the land and nothing changed at that time and all of a sudden an additional $15,000 is required to complete the land when we were ready to sign was troubling.

We have been extremely patient and understanding, but for us to have picked out colors and features it seems so deceiving and deliberate. From the plans that were literally handed to us twice coming into the office being incorrect to the back and forth about the $26,000(+fee) that was put on the costs no matter if they did the work or not. We were told an outside person could prepare the land if we had someone else, but as we wrapped things up we were told AHP had to do everything even if they charged more.

We cannot get time back, but we would rather not and definitely will not work with this company who has no consideration for its' customers and/or their budget. They knew the budget from day one, so all the #'s they eventually listed was completely disrespectful and let's us know that they were not willing to listen or compromise (and no, a "concession" for a porch that was on a plan was not compromise). We have spoken with two other contractors and the first question for both was about the Perc Test and it has not been mentioned in the two months we have spoken to this company.

I pray this was not a race thing nor taking advantage of a family who was not as informed as most, but that is why we went to the professionals. We just picked the wrong company. REDLINING BAD! Raised costs right before we were about to sign. If they did not want to work with us, it could have been a better way to do it. But I sent a similar email to the consultant and manager in the Opelika, AL office and neither have responded, letting me know that this was intentional.
Race was definitely a factor the way the "district manager" responded on the phone 5 days later. Very unprofessional.

name: Staci Dillon
text: My husband and I were traveling through the area,  passed the beautiful model homes and decided to stop in to take a look and see what they had to offer. Even though we weren’t from the area, the staff took the time to show us around and explain the process! If you are from the area you must go see them!

name: Tracy Hardy
text: I would highly recommend Americas Home Place in Opelika. Sam and Clay were very knowledgeable in knowing and explaining the process of building our new home. They were always very nice and courteous when in person or on the phone. They made the process of building our new home as stress free and as smooth as possible. They took our interest and budget at heart. Any questions that we had were answered in a timely manner and with professionalism. This is our 1st home and we are very pleased with how beautiful it is. My husband and I can tell that Americas Home Place take pride in their work which shows through the excellent craftsmanship that is shown in our home.Words can not express how thankful and happy they have made our family. Just to name  a few people, Thank you again Sam, Clay, Pauline, Paula, and Ken for making our dream come true.

name: James Powell
text: Built house 3yrs ago. Had great experience with design . Did not have good experience with building process. We had meeting this morning with Sam Mitchell  he his doing his best to correct these issue'sspoke with Mrmitchel today was very quick and responsive to issues has gone above and beyond to make sure that customers are taken care off great to be working with them

name: jared Humphry
text: This is a great company that is providing an awesome product. The staff is far superior than the other competitors, especially Stewart Black! He is personable, knowledgeable and collaborative! I would highly recommend America’s Home Place.

name: Gabe Lewis
text: Extremely professional team! Everybody makes you feel very welcomed and loves to help you in any way possible. If you’re in the market for a house, go by and meet the team, they do a wonderful job and you will not be disappointed.

name: Hailey Black
text: I stopped in one afternoon to see what they had to offer and was blown away by the amazing options! This is not your cookie cutter builder! Stewart was very accommodating and patient with my questions. Many Thanks!

name: Dana Jay
text: Walked in to look at the possibilities of building a home. Spent some time with Michael. He is very knowledgeable and helpful! Will most definitely use America's Home Place and Michael to build!

name: Leeann Buskirk
text: Ken and Stewart were amazing! They were thorough, patient and understanding! I mostly appreciate the fact that they were so professional yet personal in their effort to inform me on building vs buying.

name: Bryan Leverett
text: Was very pleased with my home build from beginning to end. I went with AHP because of the value I was receiving and they delivered with a beautiful home. From the beginning working with Ken, to the final touches with Anthony they exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend them to anyone I know of that will be building in the future. Ken and Anthony are great assets to your company!

name: Zandra Cook
text: " Overall, I am very glad that we chose America's Home place to build our home.  Ken Jackson and  Paula Avery  were very helpful in the beginning stages. This is our first home so they gave us a lot of good advice and they were very patient with us. In regards to the Contractors, Sam Mitchell, Anthony Robinson and Clay Chason they all were very professional. They did everything in a timely manner; when there was a problem they jumped right on it and that really eased my mind. I also appreciate their patience with me. Lastly, I really enjoyed Sam and Clay's down to earth personality. With that being said  i would definitely recommend  anyone to America's Home Place .

name: Emma Mask
text:
My husband and I began talking to America’s Home Place this morning about a home. We have had some great conversations with Ken Jackson learning about their homes and the process. He has been very helpful returning calls and emails and answering our questions. We asked to meet with someone at our lot to see how the process would be carried out for our location. We were pleasantly surprised to meet with someone that same day. We felt confident that we would be pleased so we agreed to build our home with AHP.

Okay,time has passed. It is now March, 2021 and we have spent a couple of nights in our new home! We are proud to recommend AHP because of the quality of the way our home was built, the way the subcontractors worked,  and the people with whom we worked from the AHP Opelika office! Clay Chason has been our project manager and has been so patient to answer numerous phone calls and texts in keeping us posted. He is very professional and knowledgeable! One thing we noticed about Clay is his attention to detail. He can spot something that needs correction or finishing immediately and sees to minute details! Clay did an amazing job getting our home finished by the date he gave us! Mr. Jim Hilliker became involved in our build shortly after we started. He was also great in keeping us informed and trying every way to please us. Both Clay and Jim were so kind and polite to me, even though I asked many questions. My husband, Ronnie, is a retired builder. He was on the job most days and can speak to the quality of materials and work done on our home. Mr. Ken Jackson spent hours with me in the beginning in selecting plans and the details of materials, changes, and choices. Each of the people were kind and professional and we are pleased with our home at this point.

name: Michael Wood
text: Every one went above and beyond to answer all of our questions through out our decision on a new house. Great people. Highly recommend them.

name: Brent McCurdy
text: I was beyond pleased with Stewart Black and his willingness to help and answer all my questions.  I will highly recommend him and your company to anyone and everyone!

name: Shelby Humphry
text: Working with Stewart at the Opelika, AL office was wonderful. He made our experience simple yet comprehensive. He was patient and informative while my husband and I tried to make the choices that would be best for our family.

name: Michael Wood
text: Every one went above and beyond to answer all of our questions through out our decision on a new house. Great people. Highly recommend them.

name: Alton & Wanda Fountain
text: We are building our home in Middle Georgia and had the opportunity to meet with America's Home Place Location Safety Compliance Officer, Sam Mitchell of Opelika, Alabama. Sam Mitchell was a godsend as we had issues we felt needed addressing and he just happened to stop by unannounced to look at and inspect one of America's Home Place's homes being built. We were very impressed AHP actually sends someone out to randomly check homes and found Mr. Mitchell very pleasant, professional with his "old school" building techniques and his care for us and the home we are building. He assured us AHP also cared and wanted to make sure we were getting the home we were expecting and deserved.  We owe Mr. Mitchell a huge thank you and appreciate the interest and quality time he shared with us.

name: Brandi Black
text: I highly recommend the team at America’s Home Place in Opelika, Al. The office has a strong, professional and knowledgeable staff. They have streamlined the building process and all work together start to finish seamlessly to build your dream home!

name: craig riddle
text: I highly recommend using this company because they are great people. Th er y will take great care of their customers.

name: Ben Williams
text: Great company to work with. Sales team and construction team were very accommodating. Anthony did an awesome job on the custom the touches we requested!

name: Brandon Cummings
text: Love these guys! Professional and willing to always satisfy your needs! Highly recommend

name: Gina Morris
text: I cannot express all the gratitude  I have for everyone at America's Home Place. Building a home can be very nerve wracking as I have built two other homes but they are so knowledgeable and answered of all my questions quickly and correctly. I appreciate their professionalism and caring ways. They were a pleasure to work with during the entire process. I highly recommend America's Home Place!

name: Property Preservation
text: The family and I recently moved to the Auburn area, and have been considering building a home once our lease ends. Out of curiosity, we stopped in to see what AHP had to offer, and we were thoroughly impressed. The location is clean, organized, and the sales person Mike knows his stuff. He took the time to give us a tour of both models, look at the different floorplans available, gave us several lenders we could contact for lending information, and gave us a nice information folder that had information on AHP, as well as some of the floorplans we were interested in. I highly recommend them if you're considering building - and if you have questions, Mike is the the guy to talk to.

name: Stephanie Graham
text: The team at AHP is very friendly & helpful, easy to work with, and they truly offer a stress-free, turn-key experience.  I highly recommend!!

name: Dottie Lewis
text: They are very friendly and always willing to help and answer any questions. Highly recommend

name: Fletcher Ford
text: Responded very quickly with answers to my questions about the home building process and how to best set up an appointment to meet with them for a personal consultation.

name: Dala Bouggess
text: Houses don't seem to be built very well but this was 20 years ago I went on the website a couple of weeks ago I haven't had a chance to really navigate through itbut I will be looking at it again so that I can see where their models are and check it out again

name: Tammy Merritt
text: Ken Jackson and his team are awesome to work with at the Opelika office.   They go over and beyond to make the building process smooth and pleasant.   They are very friendly, professional and knowledgeable.  I have worked with this office on several construction loans.  They really care about their customers and strive for 100% satisfaction.  The homes are beautiful and well built.  I highly recommend them to build your dream home.

name: Steven Meadows
text:
I have worked with the Production Team with  America's Home Place for over 5 years supplying material to them.  They have a professional staff that know their jobs. Pauline runs the office very efficiently and friendly.  Chris, Sam and Randy are the best group of Project Managers they have had since I have worked with them. When I have been on job sites they have been clean.  Bill sees to it that his guys order their material in advance so they don't lost time having  to wait on material.
They are a good group of people to work with!

name: Joan Haynes
text:
To God be the Glory.  Great experience from the start to the finish.  The Albany, Georgia group is such a great group to work with very kind, understanding, and caring.  From ashes to our new beautiful house  which turned out to be a great blessing.
We thank God for this  Albany group and for our home.
Thank you Bill, Savannah, Candace, Josh and the total work crew.   May God continue to bless you all.

name: Wyatt Sharp
text: Good staff. Very friendly. Easy to get along with.

name: Lateshia Sinclair
text: After searching for an house for over an year we weren’t able to find what we were looking for. So we decided to find a spot and build. After contacting a different builder we found out very quickly that they were forceful and didn’t have our best interest at heart. Needless to say, that they weren’t the builder of choice . We then heard of America’s Home Place from a friend. We sat down with Ken and we told him the type of house we wanted and the price we were willing to pay. The Team at America’s Home Place immediately begin to put a plan together to get us what we wanted. We were pleased with what they put together. We witnessed every stage of the construction process from start to finish. Chris kept us informed every step of the way. Once our home was complete we were very excited to move in and settle down. Thanks to America’s Home Place for making our first building experience one we won’t forget. Many thanks to Bill and Chris for keeping our best interest at heart.

name: Teresa McKelvey
text:
Our home is complete and we moved in this week. We are so very happy with our home and the whole process. We highly recommend Americas Home Place in Opelika and are sure you will be pleased with the quality of home you will receive.

We worked with Ken to find and customize the floor plan we really wanted and he was very helpful and patient as I changed my mind several times.
Bill and Chris came out to our site and offered advice on placement of our home and we're able to place the home exactly where we wanted it.
Chris answered every text or phone call and kept us informed at each step along the way. If we had any questions he was quick with an answer and worked very hard to get us the result we wanted.
Our home was completed as we wanted it, it was quality workmanship, and it was done in just over three months. It also came in under budget.
We will update later with photos.
We love our home and we are confident you will as well if you use America's Home Place.

name: Fred Mann
text: I would highly recommend America's Home Place! Big Sam and his subcontractors were wonderful to work with during our home building experience. I would build another house with Big Sam in a minute. We love our beautiful new home!

name: Christian Hale
text: Very detail oriented and friendly staff. Highly recommend them!

text: Building a new home can be a bit scary and everyone is quick to tell you of a horror story.  Not so with AHP.  Ken and Kara walked us through everything, and Bill got us on track with the building site.  Then there was Sam Mitchell.  He made everything come together at the right time just as it needed to be.  He made everything make sense and was very helpful throughout the whole process.  Great job, we are very pleased.

name: Julie Wood

text: If you are interested in building a new home, go by and visit the friendly staff in Opelika.

name: Sarah Black
text: Would highly recommend! Has the most friendly facility!

name: joss understone
text: Under Bill Addison's strict attention to detail and knowledge (with over 21 years experience in the south), the Opelika office is the best builder in the South East. They will not only build your house but they will "fit" the house to your needs. While not cutting corners to fill those needs. Our house was being built before retiring out of the military. It was a seamless transition with no building delays. Absolutely the best. I will always recommend!

name: Burgin Benson
text: A big shout out to Bill Addison and his team. Thank you for bringing us a delicious meal, a nice bag filled with goodies, and a lot of smiles. You don't know how much we appreciated this gesture of kindness and appreciation.  Thank you, Burgin Benson

name: Lamar Powell
text: Overall we had a good experience.  We had a good project manager which made it less stressful.  He answered our questions along the way and when issues did arise, he saw to it that they were addressed and/or corrected.  There is one area I think America's Home Place's management might want to improve.  And that is stress to the sub-contractors that it is in both the builder's and client's best interest for their job to be done  in a timely manner.  But just as importantly, to pay attention to detail and make sure their job is done right the first time so someone doesn't have to make a trip to address the quality of their work.  But with that said, we are very happy with our house.  We would recommend them to our friends or anyone wanting to build.

name: Carol Finley
text: Decided to stop by the America’s home place showroom to see options available for building a new home.  It was late in the afternoon so I wasn’t sure anyone would be available but one of the project managers, Chris Barrett was still working.  He was very helpful and very professional.  There showroom is full of displays providing many options for their potential customers to see..  I will definetly keep this company In mind in the future.

name: Haleigh Wilmer
text: America’s home place has an amazing team. They will go above and beyond to make you satisfied, and will work with you. Bill Addison and his team are the best, so if you’re looking into building a home they’re definitely the ones you want!

name: Brandy Scott
text: Me and my husband built a house with America’s Home place and it took no time at all. Our Construction Manager was Randy Rogers and he was extremely nice and helpful throughout the entire process. I do have one suggestion for anyone building with AHP - INSIST that Randy Rogers be your Construction Manager and it will be a walk in the park!!!

name: Alexis Rennie
text: I would definitely refer this Team of home builders to anyone looking to build a new custom built home!! When I say Team I mean they have a Team to get it done, from design to custom built complete! Go see Bill, Ken & the rest of the Team they are awesome!!

text: The General Manager, Bill Addison was very helpful throughout the whole process. I felt like him and his team actually cared more about seeing me happy than about another dollar. The whole team was very respectful, especially Ms.Pauline.

text: All I can say is I am impressed! From start to finish my expirence was amazing. We built the Dawson & we love it. I would refer Ken & Bill along with the rest of the staff to anyone looking to build a home. Thanks for everything!!

He was very thorough and kind and has made the process a lot less stressful for me!  Thank you for employing people that really care about their customers!  I look forward to working with your company soon.

text: We had a wonderful experience with AHP building our dream home. Working with the Management and Staff made it possible and easy for us. They were so easy to work with. Any issues that we had with the contractors Chris would always have the problem resolved immediately.  Working with Chris made us feel comfortable knowing that he will get things done in a timely manner.  It was a pleasure working with him and Americas Home Place knowing that they all worked as a team. I highly recommend friends, families and anyone who wants to see their dream come true, Americas Home Place will fulfill those Dreams.

name: Lottie Holmes
text: I had the most wonderful/stress free experience in the building of my new home. It was finished in three months and Randy Rogers was an excellent person to work with.  My home is beautiful and I have received many comments on how good it looks. Thanks America's Homeplace.

text: A+ team in this office! Friendly, knowledgeable and patient!

text: Americas Home Place in Opelika ,Al was awesome. They built us a beautiful home and we are extremely enjoying it. Sam Mitchell was great. He answered all my crazy questions and claimed me down on all my moments.

name: Diana Hanson
text: Thanks to each a every one that work with me. Chris did everything I ask him about. He made me feel at ease on everything. Can't wait to move in. It's beautiful. Big Thanks

name: Michael Nolen
text:
My wife and I are going through the process of building our first home and using America's Home Place Opelika was the best decision we ever could have made. We visited and spoke with home builders all across our area and none of them could match the service and support we received from AHP and their staff.
We started our process with Ken Jackson who worked extremely hard and diligently to meet or talk us through each step of our home buying process. He gave us numerous options and helped us stay within our budget. At no point did we feel pressured or coerced to make any decision and we were given all the time needed to make any adjustments before our home started being built. Ken was an excellent avenue and provided support and suggestions which lead us to making our dream home a real possibility.
Once the home was being built, we were fortunate enough to work with Sam as our site manager. Sam has been the most prompt with responses and there has not been a single time gone by where our phone calls have either been unanswered or unreturned. Sam has listened, given advice or suggestions, and been the most knowledgeable and helpful throughout the building process. He has kept us in the loop with what is happening and listening to our concerns since this was our first time in the process. He has been an excellent resource with his vast experiences in home building and helped us ensure that our home went from a simple drawing to a lifelong dream come true.
Sam, Ken, Andy, and the entire America’s Home Place staff have been unbelievably reliable and consistent. They not only met our expectations but ensured to far exceed them. I would, have, and will continue to recommend them and would not hesitate to suggest them to family, friends, or anyone starting the home building process. We can’t thank them enough for making this experience as stress-free and possible and guiding us from ideas to a home we can grow old in.

name: Troy Watson
text: Randy Rogers is highly professional and dedicated to building the best home possible. He was there for us the entire build. We would definitely recommend him

text: Great place for a quick bite. Good food and great prices.

name: Rebeccah Nolen
text:
The Opelika office of America’s Home Place has been nothing short of amazing. We are first time home builders, and did not make the decision lightly. We did a ton of research and spoke to many different builders, but none compared to Ken Jackson and his team in Opelika. Ken was ready and willing to answer any and all questions we could think of (and some we would have never thought of). He was always available, and never made us think any questions or concerns were too small. Ken made us feel comfortable and always made sure we were within our set budget.
Once Ken had our dream home on paper, we were finally ready to get started, and were passed off to our site manager, Sam. Sam has been absolutely phenomenal! He has been more than helpful walking us through he building process and letting us be as involved as we want to be. He makes sure we are up to date on any and all progress, and that everything is exactly how we expected it to be. He has really gone above and beyond any expectations we had.
I am truly grateful for all the people at America’s Home Place Opelika for making this such a smooth and easy process. I cannot wait to show off my new home that I know is one of a kind, and absolutely everything I wanted. We definitely recommend AHP to anyone and everyone looking for a quality home builder.

text: Our experience with AHP of Opelika was overall an exciting and unique adventure. They helped make our dream home come to life in a very reasonable amount of time. Kara and Ken were very patient with all our questions and concerns.  From the initial layout plans to the final paint and flooring picks they were both very knowledgeable and helpful in getting what we were wanting in our new home while still keeping things with in our budget. Our Site Manager Randy was awesome! He stepped in when the initial site manager had to relocate and did a wonderful job picking up where the previous one left off. He was very professional and courteous during the entire process. He had made himself available at any point during the build and continues to be available with any questions we have while we are adjusting too getting to know our new home. I would not hesitate to recommend him or the AHP office to anyone wishing to have a custom home built, It was a memorable first experience!

name: Rick Neidert
text: I'm going to start this by saying that at the end of the project I was happy with house but it took some doing by Sam Mitchell to make it happen, THANK YOU Sam ! Everything started out OK, working with Ken and Kara picking out the house, colors, fixtures and everything, but then things came to a screeching halt. They took a large down payment and sat on it for 5 months while I was paying interest before they even broke ground. I went through 3 project managers before Sam and had to be on the job site at least 3 -4 times a week to make sure things were being done right, I should have been put on the payroll as the project manager. The Subs that were hired to do the work were very good, the issue was getting the correct and the correct amount of material on the job site, thus holding back subs and adding to the time to complete things. Finally Sam showed up and things started happening, we worked well together and were able to get the house completed. By the end of the project the quality and house overall exceeded my expectations, just wish it had gone a little smoother in the beginning. I would do this again if I could work with Sam, he is customer driven, honest, dependable and a pleasure to work with. A note to AHP, you should take lessons from Sam on how to build houses and treat customers as well as involve the project manager in the beginning to insure questions about the build can be answered timely and accurately to eliminate misunderstandings of what's being  sold vs what's being delivered.

name: John kennedy
text:
My story may be different than most but my business in Alex City needed more office space and after calling 5 to 6 contractors only 2 gave me a quote. There cost per sqare foot seemed outrageous. I asked AHP if they did Comercial work and they confirmed they did. Within days we had a floor plan and site evaluation and a week later had a quote that was literally 35 % less than others. The process was amazingly easy, I got way more than basic Constuction and in the end they came in 6% lower than 1ts price. The communication was great and we love our new office. Ken and Bill did a outstanding job from the Opelika location and I would recommend  AHP to anyone for commercial or residential.
Absolutely a positive experance start to finish.

name: Samantha Williams
text: We sold our first home just after our youngest was born.  We had already purchased land; however, we didn't know what route to even take.  AHP came recommended by a family member.  We went for what we thought would just be a sit and chat (we had scoped them out years prior too), boy were we wrong!  Who knew it'd be a matter of days before we were picking out windows, paint, cabinets (which aren't just normal builder grade).  They helped with understanding the process, customizing our floor plan and getting things going.  Knowing that we would be living in our camper with a newborn, I was anxious!!  We got the approval for the loan and started clearing the land.  Our builder, Bill Addison, knew our situation and was more than helpful.  Doing all that he could our house was built in record time (a month).  I was on maternity leave so I had the pleasure of being able to visit the job site daily.  He answered my questions and was here daily to ensure everything went well.  We have been pleased with the house with minimal issues (GFI outlets going out).  There has not been a time that we haven't been able to call AHP/Bill and they've been able to assist.  We are faced again, with selling our beloved home.  The house is almost 4 years old and the inspector said to us "this is one of the most well-built houses I've seen in a while).  With the few things he noted, we were again able to enlist the assistance of AHP to rectify.  We have no idea where our road will take us, but we are definitely going to be building with AHP again.  Through it all, we've become great friends with Bill.  We admire his dedication to his work and the detail of building homes.  There isn't a person we do not share our story with and will continue to.  I'm looking forward to the process (who has ever said that?!) of building again in the near future!

name: Denise Pilato
text: I had an awesome experience throughout the home building process with AHP. I knew nothing about building a home, and the team at AHP helped me understand what the next step would be all along the way. With their guidance, my home is simply perfect!! I went in to the process not even really knowing which home I wanted to build, but they had patience with me and stayed engaged until I had made a decision. I could call, text or stop by anytime, and was greeted with a smile and a warm hello. Of course the construction of my home is that of quality. I did hire my own home inspector, and he was very impressed with the quality of work that AHP did during construction of my home. There were minimal "fixes" toward the end of construction so that made for minimal delay my move in day. Since moving in, there have been a few issues that have needed repair, but these issues have been remedied in a timely manner with minimal disruption in my life. I can't say enough good things about Ken, Erin, Mrs. Pauline, and Bill. If you as a consumer ever want to have a pleasant homebuilding experience, give AHP a try! Oh, and .. I have always heard that once you build a house, that the stress is so high that you will never want to do it again. I tell you this from my personal experience, I would do it again! AHP made my experience pretty much stress free!!
